name: Zigzag Infinite Runner
description:
Zigzag Infinite Runner is a driving game where you will be responsible for driving a van along an infinite road that zig zag
Zigzag Infinite Runner is the perfect game to hang out in a relaxed way, without being a game with great difficulty and to train your reflexes a bit.

The difficulty of the game lies in several aspects:

-You must click correctly at the right time or if you will not get off the road and lose. The way the van looks in this game can sometimes make this task a bit difficult since it can be difficult to calculate the distance, you'll love playing to get better!

-Not only do you have to go as far as possible, but you must collect the coins along the road, but you will also find it difficult to calculate the distances to go right through the coins.

How to play:

You simply need the mouse to play, with the mouse you will move through the menus and play. Just the moment you click the van will change direction, so to play you just need to click the left mouse button
